name: SmartCap
description: SmartCap is a digitised version of the physical SmartCap created as a part of the award winning fashion tech collection Vision Quest. IRL SmartCap was awarded with Grand Prix in the IOT/WT Innovation World Cup. The leading theme of the Vision Quest collection is enlightenment. Each piece in the collection is enhanced by different light technology symbolising spiritual awaking, intellectual growth, evolution and progress. SmartCap was created in collaboration with neuroscientists and enhanced with the electroluminescent wire and EEG technology, capturing and providing wearer with the information about brain data . It allows the wearer to be conscious of their mental state in the real time, predict, control and manage brain states.
